source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Learn the fundamentals of Drawing
items.headline: Learn about the basics of drawing, shading, still life composition and portrait drawing and boost your artistic skills
objectives_summary: The basics of Drawing

items.title: Learn how to Draw an Intricate Mandala.
items.headline: A step by step guide on how to draw a beautiful Mandala Design. Experience art therapy.
objectives_summary: Mandala art for beginners.
Learn  to draw Mandalas
A step by step guide on how to create an intricate mandala design.

items.headline: How to Draw and Sketch Hyper-real Portrait with Pencil Step by Step. Hyper- real Charcoal and Cone Drawing
objectives_summary: How to draw a prototype with a measurement method
How to volume the face, body and hair
How to draw the texture of the face and eyes in a hyper-real way

items.title: How to draw and paint a spectacular portrait in watercolor.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor
visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David

items.headline: Learn step by step, using real time video,how to draw and paint portraits in watercolor and pencil with a professional.
objectives_summary: To draw and paint a spectacular portrait from photographs
how to use just one or two colors to paint a portrait
how to use tracedown paper to make a professional pencil drawing

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Gladiolus - Flower Painting

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina

items.headline: We learn how to paint the Gladiolus flower step-by-step!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint gladiolus flower: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, glazing, detailing, flat brush
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Get the Hang of the Gesture - For Beginners and Reentries

visible_instructors.job_title: A Figure Drawing Course that will work for you
visible_instructors.title: Udo Rutschmann
visible_instructors.name: Udo

items.headline: Learn how to draw beautiful and dynamic gestures with a working easy to follow step by step approach
objectives_summary: Gesture Drawing a Complete Course for Beginners and Reentries
The course covers everything you need to know in order to draw beautiful and dynamic gestures
You will learn how to draw the gesture from scratch

items.title: Chalk pastels for beginners - A ladybug and an owl
items.headline: An easy lesson designed for success
objectives_summary: At the end of my course, the students will be able to use chalk pastels easily.
The basic techniques will be covered and the student will be able to form a basic plan for creating a chalk pastel.

items.title: Learn Basic Sea  Knots (41 important knots)
items.headline: You Will Learn The Most Used Sea Knots (41 Knots)
objectives_summary: Basic sea  Knots
Péché
nœuds marin

items.title: How To Crochet With Style - Beginners Course
items.headline: Learn how to make stylish and fun crochet projects for your friends and family
objectives_summary: Students will learn the basics of crocheting
Students will be able to learn how to crochet more advance projects fairly easy as a result of taking my course.
Students will learn how to use multiple different colors in their projects.

items.title: Watercolor lesson - Mountain with waterfall - Landscape

visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will learn freestyle watercolor techniques easily with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint watercolor flowers: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn watercolor painting techniques: wet-in-wet, layering, negative technique, glazing
Learn watercolor painting basics: values, color mixing, lifting pigments, issue fixing

items.title: Abstract portraits
items.headline: Fun and easy techniques for beginners
objectives_summary: Learn how to use paint to create effects.
Learn the basics of drawing a face.
Learn how to blend the portrait with the abstract background.

items.title: Color Harmony With Watercolors

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Make colorful artwork without all the rigid, complex color mixing theories.
objectives_summary: Three easy to apply color harmony ideas.
Learn color mixing basics like saturation, intensity, chroma and values.
How to use dominant light and dark palette choices.

items.title: Fruit Bouquets and Baskets
items.headline: Food Floristry taught by professionals
objectives_summary: A theory of food froristry
Fruit bouquets and baskets assembly
Coloristics and fasteners

Using different types of brushes and mixing Paints

items.title: Introduction to Indian Folk Art: How to make Gond Paintings
items.headline: Cultural significance of Gond Paintings in India and experiencing the hard work that goes into making one.
objectives_summary: What is a Gond Painting
How to make a Gond Painting
An Indian Folk Art Form

items.title: How To Paint a Realistic, Detailed, Butterfly in Watercolour
items.headline: Learn step by step with my real-time video on how to paint fine detail using watercolour. Let's get those brushes wet!
objectives_summary: How to paint a very detailed and realistic Painted Lady butterfly from start to finish, using numberous watercolour techniques.
This video takes you through the whole process of painting this delicate butterfy in fine detailed watercolour.
Botanical flower painting
